alert.note: Alert for Melville Foothills; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 9:08PM MST until December 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Occasional light snow and cold wind chills. Total snow accumulations of an inch or two. Local amounts up to 3 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of South Central and Southeast Montana. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted by snow and localized blowing snow. Cold wind chills of 20 to 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to remain near or below zero through the day on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
